markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Amorphous Aspect](/Feats.aspx?ID=7203) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Nephilim" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=518" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [War of Immortals](/Sources.aspx?ID=232) pg. 53

**Prerequisites**
[Proteankin](/Feats.aspx?ID=7198)

</column>

---

Your body is supremely flexible. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on checks to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=2296) or [Squeeze](/Actions.aspx?ID=2372), and when you critically fail while Squeezing, you get a failure instead.
name: Amorphous Aspect
